content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:  
  name: s3-demo-postgres
spec:  
  containers:      
  - name: application
    image: postgres:latest
    env:
    - name: POSTGRES_DB
      value: 's3demo'
    - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
      value: 's3demo'
    - name: POSTGRES_USER
      value: 's3demo'
    - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
      value: 'md5'
    ports:
    - containerPort: 3306
  - name: s3-demo-sidecar        
    image: stonebranch/universal-agent:7.3.0.0
    env:
    - name: UAGNETNAME
      value: 's3-demo-sidecar'
    - name: UAGOMSSERVERS
      value: '7999@host.docker.internal'
    - name: UAGTRANSIENT
      value: 'yes'
    - name: UAGAGENTCLUSTERS
      value: 's3_processing'
    - name: UAGBUSINESSSERVICES
      value: 'Data_Ops'
    ports:
    - containerPort: 7887
